name: Hot And Lovely 4
description:
This is a very fun casual flipping game that will exercise your memory skills!
In the game, you must find and eliminate two identical pictures.
New 13 levels are waiting for you to challenge!



Gameplay.

Beauty girl + dress up + elimination

Game Features
  • 1. 13 different levels are waiting for you to challenge
  • 2. Each character has its own unique dynamic CG
  • 3. Each character can be dressed up
  • 4. Each character has a variety of interactions waiting for you to discover


There are also good-looking achievements and background display pictures waiting for you to get.
Please go to the community to see how to get the DLC by yourself~
